constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 序列中存在一个长度恰好为 K 的递增子序列
constraints.formal: ∃ subarray A[l:r] such that A[l:r] is strictly increasing and r - l + 1 = K

constraints.name: max_increasing_subarray_length
constraints.description: 序列中所有递增子序列的最大长度不超过 K
constraints.formal: ∀ subarray A[l:r] such that A[l:r] is strictly increasing, r - l + 1 ≤ K
